scripts.start: INTERNAL=true pnpm build:start && concurrently "node scripts/build.mjs --watchChanges" "INTERNAL=true node scripts/start.mjs"
scripts.start:ngaf: pnpm clean && node scripts/build.mjs && pnpm copy-styles && concurrently "node scripts/build.mjs --watchChanges" "node scripts/start.mjs"
scripts.build: pnpm clean && pnpm types && node scripts/build.mjs && pnpm copy-styles
scripts.build:start: pnpm clean && node scripts/build.mjs && pnpm copy-styles
scripts.build:examples: INTERNAL=true cross-env NODE_ENV=production pnpm build && NODE_ENV=production INTERNAL=true SDK_EXAMPLE_BUILD=true node scripts/build-examples.mjs
